title: Dick Deadeye or duty done
creator_credit: Bill Melendez, Steven Cuitlahuac Melendez and Bill Melendez Productions
brief_description: This animated jaunty rollick of music, comedy and quirky little characters is based on the orginal works of Gilbert and Sullivan (including some new lyrics by Robin Miller) and features the voices of Victor Spinetti, Peter Reeves, George A. Cooper, Miriam Karlin, John Newton.
